channel.title: Econumo-Ce on Econumo
channel.description: Recent content in Econumo-Ce on Econumo

item.title: v0.5.0 Econumo release
item.description: Changelog # Added user onboarding. Added more icons for categories. Added a calculator widget for the transaction dialog. Refactored logic related to budget loading. Refactored the BudgetAccessModal component. Refactored the BudgetChangeCurrency component. Improved handling of the long-press directive. Fixed issue where new envelopes were created in the second position instead of the first. Corrected currency conversion for the “Available” field in the budget module. Fixed bug that occurred when clearing cache after deleting a budget.

item.title: v0.4.3 Econumo release
item.description: Changelog # Added “Total” amount to the budgeting module. GitHub releases # Econumo CE: v0.4.3

item.title: v0.4.1 Econumo release
item.description: Changelog # Updated email content. Added the ECONUMO_BASE_URL environment variable. Fixed a bug related to the default locale. GitHub releases # Econumo CE: v0.4.1

item.title: v0.4.0 Econumo release
item.description: Changelog # Added a registration feature and updated the configuration and login layout. Corrected the translation for “All accounts.” Fixed budget calculations for individual users. Resolved issues with the modal window displaying the transaction list for budgets. Introduced user avatars in the transaction list modal for budgets. Fixed a bug that displayed ghost transactions when a user changed a transaction type. Improved the currency selection box in the Budget module.

item.title: v0.3.0 Econumo release
item.description: Changelog # Econumo Family and Econumo One merged into Econumo CE and were fully open-sourced. Econumo Cloud became Econumo. Fixed a problem with currency rates for the Budget module. GitHub releases # Econumo CE: v0.3.0

item.title: v0.2.3 Econumo release
item.description: Changelog # Disabled a portion of the login form for the custom backend API URL Updated links to the Privacy Policy and Terms of Service pages Added edition to the logo GitHub releases # Econumo CE: v0.2.3

item.title: v0.2.2 Econumo hotfix
item.description: Changelog # Rollback of the dependency update in composer.lock that broke authentication GitHub releases # Econumo CE: v0.2.2

item.title: v0.2.1 Econumo release
item.description: Changelog # Added functionality to connect registered users with one another automatically. GitHub releases # Econumo CE: v0.2.1

item.title: v0.2.0 Econumo release
item.description: Changelog # Removed the legacy PostgreSQL dependency. Added an X-Timezone header to each API request to maintain consistent time zones between the frontend and backend. Addressed all of Rector’s warnings. Removed the old analytics API. Update API documentation. GitHub releases # Econumo CE: v0.2.0

item.title: v0.1.0 Econumo release
item.description: The first public release of Econumo. GitHub releases # Econumo CE: v0.1.0
